ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Conflict-managed coastal defense portfolio balancing efficacy, ecology, and community impact.

bullets.item: Hybrid grey-green defenses phased by surge and erosion risk.
Adaptive construction windows minimizing ecological disturbance.
Community access and relocation support where needed.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Sea wall + surge barrier for hotspots, complemented by dune restoration.
Habitat buffers and living shorelines to preserve ecosystem services.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Community disruption mitigation including access continuity and compensation.
